metadata.description: Specifies the location for all resources.
Specifies the environment of the deployment.
Specifies the prefix for all resources created in this deployment.
Specifies the tags that you want to apply to all resources.
Specifies the address space of the vnet of the data landing zone.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for general services of the data landing zone.
Specifies the address space of the public subnet that is used for the shared integration databricks workspace.
Specifies the address space of the private subnet that is used for the shared integration databricks workspace.
Specifies the address space of the public subnet that is used for the shared product databricks workspace.
Specifies the address space of the private subnet that is used for the shared product databricks workspace.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for the power bi gateway.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for data integration 001.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for data integration 002.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for data product 001.
Specifies the address space of the subnet that is used for data product 002.
Specifies the resource Id of the vnet in the data management zone.
Specifies the private IP address of the central firewall.
Specifies the private IP addresses of the dns servers.
Specifies the administrator password of the sql servers.
Specifies the resource ID of the central purview instance.
Specifies the Auth Key for the Self-hosted integration runtime of Purview.
Specifies whether the self-hosted integration runtimes should be deployed. This only works, if the pwsh script was uploded and is available.
Specifies whether the deployment was submitted through the Azure Portal.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Key Vault.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Data Factory.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Data Factory Portal.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Blob Storage.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Datalake Storage.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Sql Server.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for My SQL Server.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for EventHub Namespaces.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Dev.
Specifies the resource ID of the private DNS zone for Synapse Sql.

properties.description: Required for worker nodes communication within a cluster.
Required for worker nodes communication within a cluster.
Required for workers communication with Azure SQL services.
Required for workers communication with Azure Storage services.
Required for worker communication with Azure Eventhub services.
Required for workers communication with Databricks Webapp.
[format('Data Landing Zone - Self Hosted Integration Runtime running on {0}', variables('shir001Name'))]
Data Landing Zone - Self-hosted Integration Runtime

typeProperties.connectionString: [format('Integrated Security=False;Encrypt=True;Connection Timeout=30;Data Source={0}{1};Initial Catalog={2}', variables('sqlServer001Name'), environment().suffixes.sqlServerHostname, parameters('sqlDatabase001Name'))]

properties.description: Azure Databricks Compute for Data Engineering

resources.scope: [format('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/{0}/blobServices/{1}/containers/{2}', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2])]
resources.name: [guid(uniqueString(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', variables('storageAccountName'), variables('storageAccountFileSystemName')), '/')[2]), extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', variables('datafactorySubscriptionId'), variables('datafactoryResourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.DataFactory/factories', variables('datafactoryName'))))]
